#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
using namespace std;
int dash[]={18,4,10,10,8,10,18,9,21,18};
int main()
{
    int t,i,ans;
    string s;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        ans=i=0;
        cin>>s;
        while(i<s.length())
            ans+=dash[(s[i++]-48)];
        
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
}
